name: The Girl In The Window
description: *Sound On* At first glance this poem is a sad tale, by the end it makes you wonder: is it the mourning of lost love, or actually a courtship? - Animated from Hendrick Brugghen's "Bagpipe Player" c. 1624 and Bartolome Esteban Murillo's "Two Women In A Window" c. 1655/60 (both public domain courtesy of The National Gallery) poem "Lover Mourns The Loss Of Love" by William Butler Yeats. Soundscape and voice performance by myself - Laurence Fuller @laurencefuller
